name: comic-library-utilities
tagline: A toolkit for organizing, renaming, and converting comic collections
description: Comic Utils is a collection of tools for processing and organizing comic book files. It includes renaming, sorting, and conversion utilities for personal collections and supports multiple file formats.

features.title: Batch Processing
features.description: Rename and organize multiple comic files at once. Save hours of manual work

features.title: Format Conversion
features.description: Convert between different comic book formats easily. Universal compatibility

features.title: Smart Sorting
features.description: Automatically organize comics by series and issue number. Perfect library structure

features.title: Multi
features.description: Works with CBZ, CBR, PDF, and more. Handle any comic format

features.title: Command
features.description: Powerful utilities for automation and scripting. Integrate into your workflow

features.title: Personal Collections
features.description: Designed for managing home comic libraries. Keep your collection pristine
